content.rendered:
Do you ever wish that you went back to the first you, Eden maybe?

… where nothing else mattered?

Where the world did not judge us on how elegant our clothes were, or how outstanding the slick in our lipstick was but just us, NATURAL.

Where power wasn’t directly relatable to the thickness of your textile and class was not directly proportional to the city of your shopping spree – Rome, Sydney, Paris or the city of Gikomba maybe.

We all wish for a re-birth, moments where we could just touch the unfamiliar or is it the formerly familiar ends of the earth; taste the soil if we could and swim in the sands of the red-seas.

Such moments give us peace, knowing that our connection to mother nature is a gift that can never escape our hearts, never.

Cheers to a re- birth, where we can just enjoy life from where it began…the garden of happiness.
